resources.string: We need you to allow this app to Display over other apps (necessary to start Android Auto from a background service).\n\nAfter tapping OK you will land in "Display over other apps" settings screen, please look for Wi-Fi Launcher and allow it.
Notifications when service is running with no sound/vibration
Turn on Wi-Fi or Location Notifications
Notifications when Wi-Fi or Location are off with sound/vibration
Select on which Bluetooth devices to start this app
Try to automatically turn on the hotspot on the phone so the car\'s unit can join this network.\nWon\'t work on all phones.
Headunit Reloaded Wi-Fi Service is running trying to connect Wireless Android Auto
Oh no! There are permissions denied or battery optimization is enforced, tap here to fix it

Due to recent limitations added in Android 10 and above, previous methods of wireless connections are not available any longer!

The new approach will start AA Wireless session when both devices are on the same network, regardless of which device creates the hotspot. 

You need to make sure you update HUR to version 7.0!
Nearby permissions must be enable to access Bluetooth functionality
We need to modify system settings in order to toggle the hotspot on and off when connecting to your cars BT.
Only use this option, if HUR explicitly says you need too. When this mode is enabled, WiFi Launcher will only work, in client mode, meaning, devire running HUR must create the hotspot.
Couldn\'t start the service from background. Is the DRAW OVER OTHER APPS permission enabled?
App needs to have battery optimization turned off, to prevent the system for terminating the app mid connection.
No active network, cannot start AA, is mobile data on?
Try to automatically re-established the connection in case of disconnection as long as the selected BT device is still connected.
Keep the service running even after BT handsfree have been disconnected. You will need to manually quite the service in this case.
The WiFi hotspot name of device running HUR. This can be found in the tethering settings of the device running HUR.
The WiFi Direct name of device running HUR. This will be displayed on HUR home screen if device running HUR supports WiFi P2P.
Background location needed. Without this, app won\'t be able to access WiFi P2P from the background.
Location is needed for WiFi P2P, without location access WiFi Direct (P2P) won\'t be able to connect to HUR
Your phone is still connected to a WiFi network. AA will start when it disconnects
Network Discovery (both devices should be on same network)
Use WiFi Direct (also know as WiFi P2P)
WiFi client mode (car headunit will create hotspot)
Create WiFi hotspot (won\'t work on all devices!)
